item.description: Stock futures edged higher ahead of the Fed’s announcement at 2 p.m., after the Dow Jones Industrial Average logged its longest losing streak in almos...

item.title: Short-Term Loans Get Just What They Need: A Long-Term Commitment
item.description: Buy now, pay later lending is attracting deep-pocketed lenders. It could be a win-win.

item.title: 2024 Has Been a Year of Extremes in the Stock Market. Can it Last?
item.description: As extended as some trends have become this year, investors shouldn’t assume that they are about to revert to the mean.

item.title: The Firm That Wants to Power AI With Southern Yellow Pine
item.description: A U.K. electricity generator is winnowing U.S. sites for wood-burning power plants that pump their emissions underground.
